title: Remove the selected About page Team section H2 element entirely

requirements.text: On the About page, delete the selected H2 element entirely (not just its text) at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1] (the H2 within the Team section header block in frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx).

quotes: Use the XPath expression to identify the element to edit.

acceptanceCriteria:
The Team section header block in frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx no longer contains the empty

...

element (it is removed from the JSX entirely).
No 'Meet Our Team' heading text (or any other text from that H2) is visible in that section.
All other content in the Team section (the paragraph text and team member rows) remains unchanged and still renders.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1].
Do not edit any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce backend changes; this is a frontend-only DOM removal.
nonGoals: Removing or changing any other headings on the About page.
Removing placeholder images from the Team section (separate pending request).
Any design/theme overhaul unrelated to removing the selected H2 element.
